name: Bruce Willis Movies Online Quiz | People Themed | 10 Questions

questions.text: Willis may be best known for his "Die hard" movies. Who played his wife?
questions.explanation:
Bonnie Bedelia.

	Three solid action movies. (Yippee-ki-yay.)

questions.text: In "Color of Night", what role does Willis have?
questions.explanation:
Psychologist.

	The movie included a murder - so did the reviews. The movie got killed.

questions.text: Willis appeared in "Bonfire of the Vanities". Who wrote the novel?
questions.explanation:
Tom Wolfe.

	Tom Hanks starred. The success of the book didn't translate into a successful movie.

questions.text: Where does the action of "Hart's War" occur?
questions.explanation:
POW camp.

	A nice effort by Willis - not bad at all. He's the POW in charge.

questions.text: Who co-starred with Willis in "Death Becomes Her"?
questions.explanation:
Meryl Streep.

	A somewhat infrequent venture by Willis into comedy.

questions.text: What area is Willis required to patrol during most of "Striking Distance"?
Who did not appear with Willis in "Nobody's Fool"?
questions.explanation:
Gene Hackman.

	Newman starred. Tandy had one of her last roles. Griffith was in it; Hackman was not.

questions.text: What role did Willis have in "Jackal"?
questions.explanation:
Assassin.

	Willis is the would-be assassin who is pursued by Richard Gere (and Sidney Poitier).

questions.text: Which of these is NOT a Bruce Willis movie?
questions.explanation:
The Quick and the Dead.

	"Quick" was Gene Hackman and Sharon Stone. "Mercury" was an action film. "Story" was a family drama. "Last Man" was adventure.

questions.text: Which of these IS a Bruce Willis movie?
questions.explanation:
Hudson Hawk.

	"Hawk" was a major flop. "Cocktail" was Tom Cruise. "Final" was Richard Gere. "Author" was Al Pacino.
